name: Earth I
core: A first foundation suggests the matter should begin from what can bear weight over time.
shadow: Grounding becomes inertia when caution is mistaken for substance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward one practical step that can support what follows.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests testing the footing before building higher.

name: Earth II
core: An aligned pair suggests stability grows when two burdens are arranged to support rather than compete.
shadow: Support becomes dependency when structure is never allowed to evolve.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates steady cooperation can carry the work forward.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reinforcing the join before adding pressure.

name: Earth III
core: Craft and placement suggest the matter improves through patient shaping and sound construction.
shadow: Craft becomes fussiness when refinement replaces completion.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward building with skill and material honesty.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests strengthening the form before widening it.

name: Earth IV
core: Containment suggests order and boundary are more useful now than expansion.
shadow: Order becomes hardness when structure is defended beyond its purpose.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates boundaries can support disciplined progress.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests holding the center and reducing unnecessary strain.

name: Earth V
core: A stress fracture suggests the burden is no longer sitting evenly and requires direct correction.
shadow: Damage deepens when the crack is ignored in the name of endurance.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward repair through exact acknowledgment of the strain.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests halting added pressure until the break is secured.

name: Earth VI
core: Reciprocity suggests stability returns when material obligations are handled fairly and concretely.
shadow: Fairness becomes bookkeeping when balance is measured without regard for circumstance.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates practical restitution can strengthen the foundation.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests making the terms durable before proceeding.

name: Earth VII
core: A defended position suggests the work can continue if ground is held with discipline rather than stubbornness.
shadow: Defense becomes needless resistance when every pressure is treated as an assault.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward maintaining the line while advancing carefully.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests reinforcing the position before pressing outward.

name: Earth VIII
core: Sustained labor suggests the result will take shape through repetition, care, and patient effort.
shadow: Labor becomes grind when effort continues without adjustment or reflection.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward steady work applied with skill.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests refining the method so the labor remains durable.

name: Earth IX
core: A mature field suggests the accumulated work can now sustain itself with less strain than before.
shadow: Security becomes enclosure when sufficiency is used to refuse all exchange.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using abundance to support the next step wisely.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests consolidating what is already stable before extending further.

name: Earth X
core: Completion through weight suggests the cycle is ending under the full burden of what has been carried.
shadow: Completion becomes entrapment when nothing is set down and every burden is treated as permanent.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward redistributing the load before the next phase begins.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports rest, release, and a deliberate end to overextension.
